0010011001101100 0010101011000000 0 -> sum: 0101000100101100, cout: 0
0110100000011000 1101000100011110 0 -> sum: 0011100100110110, cout: 1

1010010100101111 1100110010100001 0 -> sum: 0111000111010000, cout: 1
1011011110100011 1110000000000111 1 -> sum: 1001011110101011, cout: 1
0011001110010100 0001001101101100 0 -> sum: 0100011100000000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
